title: How Close Are You To Level 13 In TFT Beta Pass?

embed.description: Gyazo is a simple way to share screenshots, GIFs, and replays in seconds. Take interesting and useful captures from games, apps, and sites instantly.

body: I'm this close... I do need to remember to claim my orbs in time before it's too late XD

replies.body: off topic, is there a point to tft weekly's if youre already at lv13?

The better question is "is there a point to TFT if you've already done the missions?"

I can't find any.
Oh boi, I am just at 3.500 points on 3 accounts at the moment, not even close to hitting those last rewards. Do you have any idea when the second beta season is going to end? :)

>The pass ends with the start of patch 9.20.

https://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/tft-beta-pass-v2-coming-soon
I've been 13 for a while, and all my claims are uncollected (since it won't do anything) :p
I dont even care about 13... I got the arenas, so Im good XD

6595 points....with 4 missions still to go. Plus the orb for today. ;)

And then I can finally drop this utterly boring mode like the trash bag it is and resume my ARAM playing while I wait for Nexus Blitz to return.

EDIT:
Aaand done!
Isn't ARURF on PBE right now though? Gonna skip that?

To be perfectly honest, I don't mind URF in any version, but it's not my preferred RGM.
I rate both Ascension and Poro King way higher than URF.

Also, there is an extreme level of toxicity in URF. "Pick Zed or else!", "Pick Akali or you're stupid!". That sort of thing.
Not to mention the excessive mastery emote spamming or bragging if anyone gets an OP champion like Fizz, Shaco, or any beforementioned assassin.

I play RGMs to have fun; not like it's streamed online with a Million bucks in it to the winner.

So while I will play it, I already know I won't enjoy it.
Got it a week ago, evidenced by my current icon
